text: today I'm making a recipe inspired by
one of my favorite cuisines of all time
Thai food
it's a stir-fried ground pork with basil

making jasmine rice cooked in coconut
milk to start off with I have total of

and the seeds if you want it spicier

then you can get your sauce ready as

enhancer and a great flavor all on its

it's so fantastic it's really rich so
